allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Migrate database from SQLite to Supabase PostgreSQL

- Replace better-sqlite3 with pg \(node-postgres\) for async database access
- Rewrite schema.ts with PostgreSQL connection pool and ENUM types
- Convert all queries to async with $1, $2 parameter placeholders
- Update all route handlers to use async/await
- Make tax service functions async for database settings access
- Add dotenv for environment variable configuration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(ssh root@173.212.203.239 "docker exec mysql mysql -e ''SHOW FULL PROCESSLIST\\G''")
Bash(ssh root@173.212.203.239 "docker inspect mysql --format ''{{range .Config.Env}}{{println .}}{{end}}'' | grep -i mysql")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add production build scripts and CORS config for Render deployment

- Add build:server and start scripts for production
- Configure CORS to allow Cloudflare frontend domain

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
